overview: Some boys like their adventures with cock to involve dicks that are decidedly on the big side - and let's face it, those are the lads we've always liked the best. Dudes who feel totally uninhibited when confronted with horse-hung, horny studs, and who know exactly what to do with every throbbing inch on offer. Caleb Moreton, Georgio Black and Denis Marpol are just some of the oversized beauts; Lukas Leung, Mike Cage and Alan Capier just some of the size-queens who will quite literally stop at nothing to get the maximum stretch on offer.
title: Horse-Hung & Horny
